code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var formatter=new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US",{style:"currency",currency:"USD",minimumFractionDigits:0,maximumFractionDigits:0});var ResultsTable=function ResultsTable(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"result",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Year"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Total Savings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Interest (Year)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Total Interest"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Invested Capital"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:props.data.map(function(yearData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:yearData.year}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[formatter.format(yearData.savingsEndOfYear)," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[formatter.format(yearData.yearlyInterest)," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:formatter.format(yearData.savingsEndOfYear-props.initialInvestment-yearData.yearlyContribution*yearData.year)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:formatter.format(props.initialInvestment+yearData.yearlyContribution*yearData.year)})]},yearData.year);})})]});};export default ResultsTable;
